plays.text: Penalty to BENJAMIN SIMON 2 minutes for Kneeing Sylvain Lefebvre
Penalty to Jeff Cowan 2 minutes for Charging Ted Donato
Penalty to Jamie Lundmark 2 minutes for Roughing Jeff Cowan
Goal scored by Marc Savard assisted by Dany Heatley and Slava Kozlov
Goal scored by Slava Kozlov assisted by Dany Heatley and Marc Savard
Penalty to Brian Leetch 2 minutes for Interference Marc Savard
Penalty to Lubos Bartecko 2 minutes for Holding Anson Carter
Goal scored by Boris Mironov assisted by Eric Lindros
Goal scored by Mark Messier assisted by Petr Nedved
Penalty to Brian Leetch 2 minutes for Holding Ilya Kovalchuk
Goal scored by Marc Savard assisted by Slava Kozlov and Ilya Kovalchuk
Goal scored by Alexei Kovalev assisted by Petr Nedved and Mark Messier
Penalty to Eric Lindros 2 minutes for High Sticking Marc Savard
Goal scored by Yannick Tremblay assisted by Slava Kozlov and Dany Heatley
